title: Russia of the Future - Wikipedia
snippet: Russia of the Future (Russian: ... Прогресса, Partiya Progressa), is a banned opposition political party in Russia founded on 15 December 2012 by Leonid Volkov and later refounded on 19 May 2018 by Alexei Navalny, who was also the founder of the non-profit organisation ...

title: Russian Supreme Court liquidates ‘Russia of the Future’ — the party that kept Navalny from registering his political party back in 2019 — Meduza
snippet: The “Russia of the Future” party that was dismantled on Monday, September 21, first appeared on the Justice Ministry’s list of registered political parties at the end of May 2019. Navalny had submitted the documents to register his party earlier that same month.
